snippet.title: WyrmBound Pre-Alpha Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
WyrmBound is being developed by me, a solo developer, in unreal engine 5.
I took inspiration for this game from games like Scalebound and Sekiro, and other Souls-like games like Nioh, Monster Hunter World, Ghost of Tsushima.

WyrmBound brings in souls-like elements and is set in a fantasy Asian world, where you'll take the role of a fearful warrior that can forge bonds with various dragons.

WishlistWyrmBound on Steam and help spread the word!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2576250/WyrmBound/

Follow the progress on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/MoonlitDragonIT

And join the discord server if you'd like! 
https://discord.com/invite/n3w5Qjxa4M

#unrealengine #scalebound #dragonnexus #dragon #asiandragon #asian 
#indiegame #indiedev #indiegames #solodev #steam #epicgames #wishlist 
#trailer
